{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=224&pl1_id=1&pl2_id=44 |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Edimax |model = EW-7708Pn |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = v2 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = May 3, 2010 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Edimax_EW-7708Pn_v2 |sernum = |wlclass = N300 |series = |if = PCMCIA (32-bit) |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 1814 |device_id = 0601 |subvendor_id = 1814 |subdevice_id = 2860 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = NDD9577080720 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:1F:1F,00:0E:2E |chip1 = Ralink;RT2860; |chip2 = Ralink;RT2820; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/11/2008 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== 2T3R MIMO
This version has a raised top and a WPS button. The FCC test report lists the following models as identical.. *Edimax EW-7708Pn / GWA-H08n (the GWA-H08n is/was common on eBay) *PCI GW-NS300N2 *Sitecom WL-180 *MINITAR MWNCB *Topcom Skyr@cer PC Card 3201n *JAHT WN-7300NP *MSI CB70SE "1242-00000266-01Z" and "1242-00000267-01Z" are silkscreened on antennas 1 and 2. The part number on the board is not really readable. [[Category:English Documentation]]
